text: Sheryl Ann "Sherilyn" Fenn (born February 1, 1965, Detroit) is an American actress. She has acted in many television programs and movies throughout her acting career. She was married to actor Johnny Depp for a brief time period. ==Selected roles== *Twin Peaks (TV series) (1990-1991), Audrey Horne *Of Mice and Men (1992), Curley's Wife *Liz: The Elizabeth Taylor Story (1995 TV movie), Elizabeth Taylor ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Detroit Category:1965 births Category:Living people
title: Sherilyn Fenn
